Color

1. Override Colors

For any change in colors : scss/variable.scss 
                  
  // colors
  $white: #fff !default;
  $gray-100: #ebf3f5 !default;
  $gray-200: #e9ecef !default;
  $gray-300: #dee2e6 !default;
  $gray-400: #ced4da !default;
  $gray-500: #959DB2 !default;
  $gray-600: #868e96 !default;
  $gray-700: #4f5467 !default;
  $gray-800: #263238 !default;
  $gray-900: #212529 !default;
  $black: #000 !default;
  
  // Color
  $blue: #009efb !default; 
  $red: #F55151 !default; 
  $yellow: #FAAB34 !default; 
  $green: #04B440 !default; 
  $primary: #009efb !default;
  $text-muted: #959DB2 !default;
  
  // Main Colors
  $primary: $blue !default;
  $secondary: #963BF1 !default;
  $success: $green !default;
  $info: $blue !default;
  $warning: $yellow !default;
  $danger: $red !default;
  $light: $gray-100 !default;
  $dark: $gray-800 !default;
  
  // light colors
  $primary-bg-subtle: #EBF7FF !default;//
  $secondary-bg-subtle: #F5ECFE !default;//
  $success-bg-subtle: #EBFFF2 !default;
  $info-bg-subtle: #EBF7FF !default;
  $warning-bg-subtle: #FEF7EB !default;
  $danger-bg-subtle: #FEECEC !default;
  $light-bg-subtle: $gray-100 !default;
  $dark-bg-subtle: $gray-600 !default;
